item.title: Potholes, 21st August
item.description:
A series of potholes have been present in Matfield Road, Cray Road and Trosley Road for a number of months. These need to be addressed adn repaired effectively,as they are now causing and will continue to cause damage to vehicles if they are not repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Matfield Road, Upper Belvedere, London

item.title: Household tipping, 21st August
item.description:
The people living in the flats (flats 1-3) at the back of number 20 continually put out food waste in black flimsy bags which are attracting rats and foxes. The result is waste being blown along Sanford Walk

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sanford Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flag hanging off lamp post in frinsted close, 21st August
item.description:
There is a lamp post opposite number 113 and it has a union jack flag on it, this has been flapping in the wind and keeping residents awake at night. There is more than 1 flag, its on about 3/4 lamp post that its on in frinsted road and twigg close. Please can these be removed urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frinsted Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human defecation in public needs cleaning up, 21st August
item.description:
After coming out of my house this morning I noticed this sight directly in front of the gates leading to the gardens of Ambassador Court between 9 Holly Street Ambassador Court and 11 Holly Street. This is not the first time.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Holly Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on the pavement, 21st August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Commerell Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Fruit that falls and is very slippery and messy. Its extremely dangeorous, 21st August
item.description:
Outside 16 & 20 little heath road. Fruit already falling and will continue throughout autumn. Causing slippery surface. Also causing a lot of mess to my driveway and this fruit gets trodden on and brought into the house. Last year someone was sent out to clean with a dustpan and brush which did not fix the problem. Several falls have been caused by these fruits.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Heath Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
